userstory.title: Maintain list of IRA positions
userstory.userStory: As a user I want to be able to add and remove portfolio positions. I would like to be able to create multiple portfolios.

userstory.title: Track position performance
userstory.userStory: As a user I would like to track and compare performance of positions over different periods of time.

userstory.title: Run Simulations
userstory.userStory: As a user I would like to be able to run simulations of a selected portfolio over a particular time period in the past .
